ja492:6.3: girīnajjo → giri nadiyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | girinajjo (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja492:8.1: Aññampi → aññaṃ hi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | aññañhi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja492:13.3: migavadhāya → miga viriyaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | migaviriya (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja492:18.4: byagghe → vyagghe ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | byaggho na (sya1ed, sya2ed)
